title: (x) eSP logo - Aachen, Lubalin Graph, Souvenir {Tiff}
content:
Hi there, can anyone identify the type used in the enclosed ’eSP’ logo I’m trying to recreate? I’m 99% sure that the ’e’ is Eurostile LT Bold Condensed (widened a tad). But can anyone ID the others?

Many thanks for your help,

AG

author: a_gray

comments.content: Many thanks for your help with this, much appreciated!
